catalog_script_client.name: Refresh Primary Site Info

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_5203c4a11b1e3514824752c1604bcbde
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="DIT New Network Service Request">670690da1bf5f110824752c1604bcbe7</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:afcd15561b713510824752c1604bcb7d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Refresh Primary Site Info</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    var ga = new GlideAjax('x_g_sonc_ns_pro.cmdb_ci_site_ajax');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getSite');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_sys_id', newValue);
    ga.getXMLAnswer(getSite);

    function getSite(response) {
		
		// alert(response);

        var site = JSON.parse(response);
		g_form.setValue('location', site.location);
		g_form.setValue('primary_site_contact', site.primary_poc);
		g_form.setValue('alternate_site_contact', site.alternate_poc);
		g_form.setValue('dest_site', site.sys_id.toString());
		g_form.setValue('dest_location', site.location.toString());
        g_form.setValue('dest_county', site.county);
		g_form.setValue('dest_street', site.street);
		g_form.setValue('dest_city', site.city);
		g_form.setValue('dest_state', site.state);
        g_form.setValue('dest_zip', site.zip);

    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wbbusby</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-03 20:41:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5203c4a11b1e3514824752c1604bcbde</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh Primary Site Info</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NS Pro" source="x_g_sonc_ns_pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NS Pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5203c4a11b1e3514824752c1604bcbde</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>wbbusby</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-03 21:01:12</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
